title: Practical Mathematics Competency Enhancement Course Using Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Arithmetic and Algebraic Concepts
context.additional_context: Blended learning design linking smartphone-based VR simulations with offline workshops for practical mathematics application training to solve daily workplace problems

learning_goals: Perform mathematical modeling processes with over 80% accuracy through work-scenario-based VR simulations
Practice data-driven decision-making at least three times by applying statistical analysis techniques to real-life problems
Verbally present mathematical problem-solving solutions developed through collaborative projects with peers in a 15-minute presentation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
